name: Costume Party
description:
Travel through time and space, to be with the girls you’ve only dreamt about!
Visit a distant desert, slay a stormy sea, take a walk on the wild side…
Is it really happening, or is it just your fantasy?
There’s never been a Costume Party like this before!
How did you get to this crazy hotel in the first place?
What powers do these girls have, to make you feel transported?
It’s all so very confusing, but I’m not complaining!
Venture into a ‘Quickie’ experience, to just be thrown into the fun!
For those of you craving more control, feel free to explore ‘Custom’ mode!
Of course virtual reality is supported! Don’t be silly! Isn’t VR real anyway?
Or play old-school style, with just your mouse and keyboard! How about that!
We promise to update this game regularly, with more characters! We really do!
And how do I leave this Hotel? I’m not back in California again, am I?
